page.title: 18THE YEAR AT ST.AIDAN'S-TOBY
page.content: We all came back to school from the summer holidays.Half of the children were in new classes and I reached the top of the school.It's my final year. Soon we were preparing for Harvest Festival.That morning the school was full of fruit and vegetables ready to go down to the church.We presented our gifts to the vicar and he said thankyou and blessed them. Later in the year we were getting ready for Bonfire Night.We made a huge bonfire picture on the wall in the entrance hall.Then we made the guy out of old clothes stuffed with straw. Soon it was time for Christmas.We all had fun getting our plays ready along with the songs and carols.There was a huge Christmas tree in the hall and on the day of Christmas lunch all the teachers were in fancy dress. When we came back from our Christmas
